remarks: Derive Nicod's rule of modus ponens using 'nand', from the standard one.  Although the major and minor premise together also imply ` ch ` , this form is necessary for useful derivations from ~ nic-ax .  In a pure (standalone) treatment of Nicod's axiom, this theorem would be changed to an axiom ($a statement).  (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 19-Nov-2007.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nic-jmin $e |- ph $.
nic-jmaj $e |- ( ph -/\ ( ch -/\ ps ) ) $.
nic-mp $p |- ps $.
